post: Congrats to National Civics Teacher of the Year finalist Jamie Naragon! Jamies project-based approach connects students to community partners, whether its oral histories for A250, mock trials, or research. Everything she does turns curiosity into citizenship. 🔗  https://bit.ly/471HkZi  #CivicEducation  #ProjectBasedLearning  #CivicLearning  #Teachers

Teachers are busy, we get it. Thats why entering the Civic Star Challenge takes less time than grading 1 assignment. With just 3 questions, your students can be part of Americas 250th celebration! 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #TeachingResources  #CivicEducation

Did your students celebrate Constitution Day last week? 🎉 Log your classroom activities in the Civic Star Challenge today and you could earn recognition + prizes for work youve already done! 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #ConstitutionDay  #America250

I absolutely love them! The kids use them every day, highlighting & looking information up.   Lili V., New York educator $1 = 1 copy for a student in your state:  https://bit.ly/40EsBAg  #TeacherVoices  #CivicsChampion  #CivicEducation  #SupportTeachers

Join us in congratulating Kevin Jackson of Petaluma High School in California, National Civics Teacher of the Year finalist! Kevin empowers seniors to read founding documents, practice civil dialogue, and take local action. 🔗  https://bit.ly/4pHx3cg  #CivicEducation  #CivicLearning  #Teachers  #StudentVoice

📜  #OTD in 1789, Congress proposed the Bill of Rights, outlining essential protections for individual liberty and limiting government power. How can we help students connect these rights to their own responsibilities as citizens? Lesson on assembly & petition:  https://bit.ly/46TnWxC  #TDiH  #CivicEducation  #BillOfRights  #CivicVirtues

Leadership, purpose, and national defensedont miss our new Honoring Service episode with Gerald Gangaram and Jennifer Zais of Booz Allen Hamilton. How do service, responsibility, and civic virtue shape great teams? Watch and weigh in. 🔗  https://bit.ly/4muYSla  #HonoringService  #CivicLeadership  #Veterans  #CivicEducation  #PublicService

Shine a spotlight on your students! The Civic Star Challenge gives classrooms recognition alongside $200K+ in prizes. Inspire, engage, and connect your students to Americas 250th! 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #StudentVoice  #CivicEducation  #America250

Its almost here! The Florida MyImpact Challenge Civics Fair is Oct. 11 at UCF. Students from across the state will showcase service projects, pitch new ideas, and compete for up to $2,000 in prizes. 📅 Dont miss outregister now:  https://bit.ly/45YV1rx Florida MyImpact Challenge is hosted by the Bill of Rights Institute thanks to our sponsor Travelers.  #FloridaStudents  #MyImpactChallenge  #CivicLeadership  #ServiceLearning  #YouthLeadership

📜  #OTD in 1957, President Eisenhower issued Executive Order 10730, sending federal troops to protect the Little Rock Nine as they integrated Central High School. How can this moment help students understand the role of the federal government in protecting rights? Check out this lesson:  https://bit.ly/3YdZvqS  #TDiH  #CivilRights  #CivicEducation  #EqualProtection
